I'd highly recommend giving "Scream 3" a watch! It's a fun and entertaining parody film that continues the story of the original Scream series, featuring some familiar faces like David Arquette, Neve Campbell, and Courteney Cox.

If you're looking for something with a unique twist, "The Truman Show" is another great choice. This thought-provoking parody movie stars Jim Carrey as an insurance salesman who discovers his entire life is actually a reality TV show. It's definitely worth checking out!

This modern documentary tells an inspiring tale about three athletes, one of whom becomes paraplegic due to an accident but still manages to complete a triathlon. Mark Wahlberg and George Clooney star in this film that beautifully combines the themes of resilience and sports.

Another captivating film I'd like to mention is 'The English Patient', which takes place at the end of World War II, with a mysterious plane crash victim's past revealed through flashbacks and an intriguing love story unfolding. This film boasts an impressive cast featuring Kristin Scott Thomas and Ralph Fiennes.
